name: Spades Duel Online Card Game
description:
CHALLENGE YOUR RIVALS, BEAT THEM IN SPADES BATTLE

Spades Duel app is now available on Apple Store for your IOS devices, you can download SPADES DUEL ONLINE for FREE and play this extraordinary mobile spades card game everywhere and anytime you want.

If you enjoy playing popular board games like Classic Spades, Euchre, Hearts, Solitaire, Kings, Spit, Gin Rummy and Canastra, Blackjack, Poker; Spades Duel is definitely what you are looking for!

Forget all kind of spades games you have ever known. Get ready to play the most unique Spades Card Game ever! Enjoy fair play and random card distribution.

If you do not know how to play Spades Duel, do not worry. You can start with a tutorial for beginners & challenge the Artificial Intelligence until get ready for real online battle! After some experience you can challenge strong rivals. Install now, beat your rivals, become a legend of Spades Duel, feel the joy!

HOW TO PLAY?

Unlike classic spades game, Spades Duel is played with 2 players using standard 52 cards deck. Spades are always trump and most important cards. Aim of the game is to guess the score you will get at the end of the game and try to block your opponent to achieve their bid. Earn a higher score than your opponent and win the game! Become one of the best spades players and carry yourself up to the leaderboard! Take your level up!

THE REAL BATTLE | CHALLENGE AND WIN

*Get ready to challenge Spades experts all around the world.
*Match with better players as you win more games.
*Take your level up.
*Become the genuine master of Spades in this competitive environment.
*Gain the respect of spades card game players.

SPLENDID VISUALITY

*Best visual experience with full HD graphics.
*Optimised graphics to fit tablets and phones.
*Enjoy high quality animations.
*Multitouch support is enabled.

LIVE GAMEPLAY | ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

*Play against similar level real opponents.
*Unlock new achievements and prove your skills!
*The more experience you get, the harder rivals you match.
*Quick and fast flow of game.

FASTEST SPADES CARD GAME EVER

*Easy to match, quick to play!
*Are you a newbie yet? Do not worry! You can play offline against Artificial Intelligence as well.

FREE COINS | DAILY REWARDS

*Earn free chips by watching rewarded ads.
*Do not have to watch long seconds ads for free chips like in other spades card games.
*Infinite chance of watching short ads to get free chips.
*Login with your Facebook Account, earn more chips as a welcome gift.
*Login every day to earn more rewards.

SOCIALIZE & MEET NEW PEOPLE

*Infinite chat with your opponents!
*Express your feelings using different kind of emojis!
*Glorify or vilify your opponents.
*Play with your friends.

STATISTICS

*Get information about your gameplay results in a deep way.
*Thus get a chance to improve yourself more.
*Show your strength and capability to your opponents with your high statistics results.
